attributes.action: abolish the proposed Manchester congestion charges before they are implemented.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is merely another means of taxing the incomes of workers budgets which are already stretched. Instead why not use some of the £48 billion generated through motoring taxes including fuel duty, car tax discs, the vehicle excise duty , and VAT on petrol, to improve public transport, and REDUCE the cost of public transport. Without the need for this additional stealth tax.
